subject: Management
title: The Trust Multiplier
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Trust Multiplier usable.

hook.text: Google found that the best managers aren't the smartest. They're the ones who trust their teams.

buildup.text: Trust lets people take ownership. Ownership drives engagement and creativity.

discovery.text: Delegation is the primary mechanism through which managers build trust.

twist.text: But trust must be earned in both directions. Managers must prove they won't punish mistakes.

climax.text: Teams with high trust outperform low-trust teams by 50% on average.

punchline.text: Delegate to build trust, not just speed.

quiz.question: How does delegation build trust?
options: It gives people ownership and shows confidence in them
It reduces the manager's workload permanently
It eliminates the need for oversight
